Joel and Emma take on the world!

Joel is a supersonic fabulous handy man that is making our beautiful van from scratch with an itch inside his head!

Emma is a newby to the trade, annoying Joel and spending all the money

Vanessa is a 2006 Renualt Master (MWB, High Roof) - she was previously converted and feeling quite unloved. We have started fixing her up, stripping her to a shell and kitting her out with an all new style.

New seats 24.08.19

: Harry Buckland, Cheltenham

After a visit to a scrap yard and finding some bargin (Â£15 each!) Alfa Romeo leather captain chairs we upgraded our front seats - bye bye uncomfortable bench seat.

Our first trip 06.08.19

: Peak District to Edinburgh

With a bed and Jimmy Carr comedy playlist we hit the road for our first trip. Stopping in the Peaks, Lakes and Edinburgh!

Built the bed 03.08.19

: Warwick

At Emma's parents house we ripped out the previous van build, leaving just the cladding shell and built our high rise bed

Our van 21.07.19

: Hackney

The day we bought our Renault Master and named her Vanessa. It wasn't without its complications, Joel's bank rejected the payment due to unusual activity - causing the seller and us to come to an agreement and leave the keys with a mutual friend until the payment arrived!

First gumtree listing visit 06.04.19

: Canley

Joel visited a very cheap but rusty 12 seater minibus

Carvan, Camping and Motorhome show 24.02.19

: Birmingham NEC

Emma drove her first campervan. We realised premade campers don't have what we wanted - do it yourself is the way forward.

First Date 25.01.19

: Birmingham City

We met at Birmingham New Street Station with a pint of orange squash and a quick wee before heading to the Alcatraz escape room (which we escaped!). Emma witnessed Joel's crazy dance moves for the first time...
